00023 #include "application.hpp"
00024 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00025 
00026 #define STR(s) _xstr_(s)
00027 #define _xstr_(s) std::string(#s)
00028 
00029 namespace isis

00031 namespace util

00033 
00034 const LogLevel Application::LLMap[] = {LogLevel( 0 ), error, warning, info, verbose_info};
00035 
00036 Application::Application( const char name[] ): m_name( name )
00037 {
00038     Selection dbg_levels( "error,warning,info,verbose_info" );
00039     dbg_levels.set( "warning" );
00040     parameters["dCore"] = dbg_levels;
00041     parameters["dCore"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Core module" );
00042     parameters["dCore"].hidden() = true;
00043 
00044     parameters["dData"] = dbg_levels;
00045     parameters["dData"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the Data module" );
00046     parameters["dData"].hidden() = true;
00047 
00048     parameters["dImageIO"] = dbg_levels;
00049     parameters["dImageIO"].setDescription( "Debugging level for the ImageIO module" );
00050     parameters["dImageIO"].hidden() = true;
00051 
00052     parameters["help"] = false;
00053     parameters["help"].setDescription( "Print help" );
00054     BOOST_FOREACH( ParameterMap::reference ref, parameters ) //none of these is needed
00055     ref.second.needed() = false;
00056 }
00057 Application::~Application() {}
00058 
00059 bool Application::init( int argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00060 {
00061     bool err = false;
00062     m_filename = argv[0];
00063 
00064     if ( parameters.parse( argc, argv ) ) {
00065         if ( parameters["help"] ) {
00066             printHelp( true );
00067             exit( 0 );
00068         }
00069     } else {
00070         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to parse the command line";
00071         err = true;
00072     }
00073 
00074     if ( ! parameters.isComplete() ) {
00075         std::cerr << "Missing parameters: ";
00076 
00077         for ( ParameterMap::iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00078             if ( iP->second.isNeeded() ) {std::cerr << "-" << iP->first << "  ";}
00079         }
00080 
00081         std::cerr << std::endl;
00082         err = true;
00083     }
00084 
00085     if( parameters["dCore"].isSet() ) {
00086         setLog<CoreDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>()] );
00087         setLog<CoreLog>( LLMap[parameters["dCore"]->as<Selection>()] );
00088     }
00089 
00090     if( parameters["dData"].isSet() ) {
00091         setLog<DataDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>()] );
00092         setLog<DataLog>( LLMap[parameters["dData"]->as<Selection>()] );
00093     }
00094 
00095     if( parameters["dImageIO"].isSet() ) {
00096         setLog<ImageIoDebug>( LLMap[parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>()] );
00097         setLog<ImageIoLog>( LLMap[parameters["dImageIO"]->as<Selection>()] );
00098     }
00099 
00100     if ( err ) {
00101         printHelp();
00102 
00103         if( exitOnError ) {
00104             std::cerr << "Exiting..." << std::endl;
00105             exit( 1 );
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     return ! err;
00110 }
00111 void Application::printHelp( bool withHidden )const
00112 {
00113     std::cerr << this->m_name << " (using isis " << getCoreVersion() << ")" << std::endl;
00114     std::cerr << "Usage: " << this->m_filename << " <options>, where <options> includes:" << std::endl;
00115 
00116     for ( ParameterMap::const_iterator iP = parameters.begin(); iP != parameters.end(); iP++ ) {
00117         std::string pref;
00118 
00119         if ( iP->second.isNeeded() ) {
00120             pref = ". Required.";
00121         } else if( iP->second.isHidden() ) {
00122             if( !withHidden )
00123                 continue; // if its hidden, not needed, and wie want the short version skip this parameter
00124         }
00125 
00126         if ( ! iP->second.isNeeded() ) {
00127             pref = ". Default: \"" + iP->second.toString() + "\"";
00128         }
00129 
00130         std::cerr << "\t-" << iP->first << " <" << iP->second->getTypeName() << ">" << std::endl;
00131 
00132         if ( iP->second->is<Selection>() ) {
00133             const Selection &ref = iP->second->castTo<Selection>();
00134             std::cerr << "\t\tOptions are: " <<  ref.getEntries() << std::endl;
00135         }
00136 
00137         std::cerr << "\t\t" << iP->second.description() << pref << std::endl;
00138     }
00139 }
00140 
00141 boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase > Application::getLogHandler( std::string /*module*/, isis::LogLevel level )const
00142 {
00143     return boost::shared_ptr< _internal::MessageHandlerBase >( level ? new util::DefaultMsgPrint( level ) : 0 );
00144 }
00145 const std::string Application::getCoreVersion( void )
00146 {
00147 #ifdef ISIS_RCS_REVISION
00148     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH ) + " [" + STR( ISIS_RCS_REVISION ) + "]";
00149 #else
00150     return STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MAJOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_MINOR ) + "." + STR( _ISIS_VERSION_PATCH );
00151 #endif
00152 }
00153 
00154 }
00155 }
